javacc.structure

Class XTM

  • java.lang.Object
    • javacc.structure.XTM

  • public class XTM
extends java.lang.Object
    XTM is a specialization of the XML language, one of its derivates specifically designed to format information with an associative structure: XTM is the XML format variant specific for concept maps, semantic networks, knowledge bases, and in general, for logical and cognitive structures.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected TopicMap topicMap
      The TopicMap of the XTM file, should be accessed via getTopicMap() and setTopicMap(TopicMap, boolean) methods
      protected java.lang.String xml_encoding
      Represent the XML encoding char set (in this parser is fixed to UTF-8)
      protected java.lang.String xml_version
      Represent the XML version of the file (in this parser is fixed to 1.0)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XTM()
      Creates an empty XTM structure
      XTM(TopicMap tm)
      Creates an XTM structure specifying the topicMap

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TopicMap getTopicMap()
      Get the TopicMap of the current XTM object.
      void print(java.lang.String fileName)
      Print the entire structure into a LOG file.
      boolean setTopicMap(TopicMap theTopicMap, boolean overwrite)
      Set the TopicMap of the current XTM object

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        protected java.lang.String xml_version
        Represent the XML version of the file (in this parser is fixed to 1.0)

    • Constructor Detail

      • XTM

        public XTM()

      • XTM

        public XTM(TopicMap tm)
        Creates an XTM structure specifying the topicMap
        Parameters:
        tm - Specify the topicMap

    • Method Detail

      • setTopicMap

        public boolean setTopicMap(TopicMap theTopicMap,
                           boolean overwrite)
        Set the TopicMap of the current XTM object
        Parameters:
        theTopicMap - Specify the topicMap for this structure
        overwrite - If true enables overwriting, set it to false to false to disable overwriting
        Returns:
        False is returned only if @param overwrite was set to true and a topicMap already exists for this structure

      • getTopicMap

        public TopicMap getTopicMap()
        Get the TopicMap of the current XTM object.
        Returns:
        The topicMap.

      • print

        public void print(java.lang.String fileName)
        Print the entire structure into a LOG file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Should be the full path of the file name. Es: "C:\Desktop\XTM_FILE_TO_PARSE.xtm_LOG.txt"
